heading: Tuesday
text: Any flurries ending early, becoming partly to mostly sunny, except partly cloudy in the Adirondacks and St. Lawrence Valley. Highs in the upper 20s to lower 30s in southern valleys, and in the broad valleys west, low to mid 20s elsewhere. Light winds east of the Green Mountains, from the south to southwest 5 to 10 mph in areas west of the Greens, and gusting to 20 mph in the Champlain Valley.

heading: Tuesday Night
text: Mostly cloudy. Lows in the teens to around 20, rising into the 20s in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys. Winds becoming south 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly cloudy. Chance of rain or snow showers in the northern mountains, and near the international border. Highs from the mid 30s to around 40 south and in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys, low to mid 30s elsewhere north. South winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 25 mph in the Champlain and St. Lawrence valleys.
